data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borovec, Roman, Nakládal, Oto (2018): Eudraces barclayi sp. nov., with some notes on the genus Eudraces Marshall (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae: Myorhinini).
